sentences.sContent: Yellow refers to the smutty type, and grey or black to spam messages, many of which offer products or services of various shades of legality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yellow refers to the smutty type, and grey or black to spam messages, many of which offer products or services of various shades of legality.
sentences.sCn: 黄段子是指那些含有内容淫秽的短信，灰段子和黑段子是指那些提供法律灰色地带产品和服务的垃圾信息。

sentences.sContent: Yellow refers to the smutty type, and grey or black to spam messages, many of which offer products or services of various shades of legality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yellow refers to the smutty type, and grey or black to spam messages, many of which offer products or services of various shades of legality.
sentences.sCn: 黄色指涉及淫秽内容的短信，而灰色或黑色则是指涉及提供非法服务或产品的垃圾短信。

synos.tran: 猥亵的；弄脏的；害了黑穗病的

words.tran: 淫猥地；（被煤灰、尘埃等）弄脏地

trans.tranOther: marked with small pieces of dirt or  soot
